title: Person Of Interest - Flying Finch
author: Novus Destiny
comment:
One of the great scenes from the series.
"You ever flown a plane this size before?"
"Heavens, no. Props only."

"What is it you really do again?" 
"I help people." 
"Want to help me get a drink?"
🤣🤣🤣
I’ll admit that throughout this whole episode I was expecting the stewardess to be one of the bad guys.
I love the scene flight attendant Reese throw a bottle of water to the man🤣
This was my favorite POI episode! I lmao through most of it. Jim is sooooo sexy and adorable, and I love Finch!
